MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to dissemminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

English.Keywords: pocketpc,compact framework,ftp,internet,file transfer protocol,windowsce,.net cf,file transfer
English.Char_Desc_45: FTP client from the neoTools Series
English.Char_Desc_80: FTP client with Adressbook and Resume Downloads functionality
English.Char_Desc_250: This is the FTP client from the neoTools Series. This client can be invoked form neoScan to establish a FTP connection to the scanned port. An - Adressbook - Resume Downloads functionality belongs of cause to the supported features list.

YOU MAY:
1. Install and use one copy of the SOFTWARE on a single computer. 2. Install a second copy of the SOFTWARE on a second computer only if you are the main user of this computer (home computer or laptop for example). 3. Install the SOFTWARE on another computer only if you change main workstation. In such a case you must uninstall the software from the old computer. 4. Make a copy of the SOFTWARE for archival purposes only.
YOU MAY NOT:
1. Copy and distribute the SOFTWARE or any portion of it. 2. Sublicense, rent, lease or transfer your personal registering number. 3. Sublicense, rent or lease the SOFTWARE or any portion of it. 4. DISTRIBUTION:
You are hereby licensed to make as many copies of the FREE VERSION or UNREGISTERED SHAREWARE VERSION as you wish and distribute it to anyone provided that all files are intact. Computer magazines are authorized to distribute it on any cover disk or CD-ROM without preliminary permission. The SOFTWARE is supplied "AS IS". Milosz Weckowski disclaims all warranties, expressed or implied, including, without limitation, the warranties of merchantability and of fitness for any purpose. The user must assume the entire risk on using the SOFTWARE.
